acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: These articles were given to the Library by Dr. Delmar F. Weaver of Culpeper, Virginia, on June 3, 1986, without restrictions.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: This collection of six local history articles by Delmar F. Weaver contains twelve items, 1985-1986, consisting of an electrostatic copy of each manuscript and a newspaper clipping of each as it appeared in the Madison Eagle.The articles include: "The Transportation Business of B.F. Weaver, 1833-1905," "Locust Dale Academy, 1858-1911," "The Blue Ridge Turnpike from Gordonsville to New Market, Virginia," "The Swift Run Gap Turnpike and the Fredericksburg and Valley Plank Road Companies," The Madison Court-house and Orange Railroad Company," and "Liberty Mills on the Rapidan."
